questions.question: What verb means to become deeply involved in something, like being fully absorbed?
Which verb means to increase the range, scope, or extent of something?
What verb means to improve the quality or value of something?
What noun describes an idea or opinion formed before having all the facts?
Which verb means to encourage or nurture the development of something?
Which phrasal verb means to fully understand or absorb something?
Which phrasal verb means to encounter or find something by chance?
What phrasal verb means to get rid of something unwanted or unpleasant?
Which idiom means to challenge yourself by trying something new or unfamiliar?
answers: step out of your comfort zone

questions.question: What adjective describes something that reveals a new perspective or changes your view?
